name: Tu Lang Jaa
description:
The game is single player game, you can play with Direction Controls on your keyboard. Travel maximum distance without colliding with traffic cars, that will come your way. If you overtake them closely, that will considered as an overtake score. View leaderboard on game over and see what others are doing and beat them to remain in top 10 in the leaderboard rankings!! Good Luck.

Assets used are taken from freepik.com & Pixabay.com
